messages.content: what is the best place to eat in portland oregon

As an AI language model, I don't have personal preferences or experiences when it comes to food. However, Portland, Oregon is known for its diverse and vibrant food scene, with a wide range of cuisine options to choose from. Some popular restaurants in Portland include Pok Pok, Portland Mercado, Deschutes Brewery, and Pine State Biscuits. It's always best to do some research and read reviews to find the best place to eat based on your personal preferences and dietary restrictions.
is north portland a safe place to live

Like any city, there may be areas in North Portland that are safer than others. It's always best to do your own research and check crime statistics for the specific neighborhood you are considering. Additionally, you may want to consider factors such as transportation options, access to amenities, and overall quality of life when evaluating the safety of a neighborhood. It's also a good idea to talk to locals and get a sense of the community vibe and atmosphere.
